Module org.eclipse.persistence.core

Package org.eclipse.persistence.core.sessions

package org.eclipse.persistence.core.sessions
  • Class
    Description
    CoreLogin<PLATFORM extends CorePlatform>
    INTERNAL A abstraction of login capturing behavior common to all persistence types.
    CoreProject<DESCRIPTOR extends CoreDescriptor,LOGIN extends CoreLogin,SESSION extends CoreSession>
    INTERNAL A abstraction of project capturing behavior common to all persistence types.
    CoreSession<DESCRIPTOR extends CoreDescriptor,LOGIN extends CoreLogin,PLATFORM extends CorePlatform,PROJECT extends CoreProject,SESSION_EVENT_MANAGER extends CoreSessionEventManager>
    INTERNAL A abstraction of session capturing behavior common to all persistence types.
    CoreSessionEventListener
    INTERNAL A abstraction of session event listener capturing behavior common to all persistence types.
    CoreSessionEventManager<SESSION_EVENT_LISTENER extends CoreSessionEventListener>
    INTERNAL A abstraction of sessuin event manager capturing behavior common to all persistence types.
